 ğŸš«ğŸ˜°ğŸš« Stress Free Ferrum Utility 
 
 Whoever is holding the NFT in their wallet on the day of token distribution will receive the airdrop for that specific project. 
 
 *** 
 
 **About "Invitation to Ascension**" 
 
 This is a piece titled â€œInvitation To Ascensionâ€. It represents the end of the â€œmodern ageâ€ and our accelerating approach towards the Singularity, or the Neo Modern Age. The sunken CRT monitor is indicative of the post 9/11 internet society, and the fractal spiral orbs above and glowing doorway in the distance represents the approaching Epoch and our invitation to ascension. The whole scene being framed by the Roman pillars is symbolic of the enduring beauty of aesthetics through our transition technologically, societally and spiritually. 
 
 *** 
 **Get To Know Vapor95** 
 
 Vapor95 is a Los Angeles based team of Vaporwave enthusiasts. Their common vision is to provide a platform and infrastructure to Vaporwave artists to express their creativity and monetize their work. Along with their clothing collection, they also branch out into posters, candles, music and blogging.  
 
 You can check them out here: [https://www.vapor95.com](http://www.vapor95.com) 
 
 Check out Vapor95 carefully curated gallery on Foundation: [https://foundation.app/Vapor95](https://foundation.app/Vapor95)
